name: Unknown Origins
description:
Adventure into a world of hacking, help the hacker stop the black hat hackers from taking over the world, there are multiple endings to choose from and this is only PART 1 of this thrilling adventure. So come on, what are you waiting for? Go play!

Known Issues:

A Button can be clicked/tapped but does not register

A few boxes of text can actually be changed but only for the players run until refresh

There is an added link to another website for my newer project that continues the story

Full-screen can cause it to appear in a phone shape because of it being meant to be on mobile devices (I don't know if I can fix this one unfortunately)

A part of the game is just a white screen with button options (fixing that and it will be release with the fixed boxes of texts and broken code for the button)
